## View.onPaneMenu() method

Populates the pane menu.

(Replaces the previously removed `onHeaderMenu` and `onMoreOptionsMenu`<!-- -->)

**Signature:**

```typescript
onPaneMenu(menu: Menu, source: 'more-options' | 'tab-header' | string): void;
```
